dataSet.name: DataSet

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Object = Section Then CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then "<For all sections and objects, except specified>" End Else Object End

CASE WHEN User = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases)) + ", except specified>" Else Presentation(UserType) + ": " + CASE WHEN ValueIsFilled(User) Then Presentation(UserDuplicate) Else "<All infobases>" End End

orderExpression.dcscom:expression: CASE WHEN User = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases)) + ", except specified>" Else Presentation(UserType) + ": " + CASE WHEN ValueIsFilled(User) Then Presentation(UserDuplicate) Else "<All nodes>" End End

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then "<Common date>" Else Section End

CASE WHEN SettingOwner = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases)) + ", except specified>" Else Presentation(SettingOwnerType) + ": " + CASE WHEN ValueIsFilled(SettingOwner) Then Presentation(SettingOwnerDuplicate) Else "<All infobases>" End End

orderExpression.dcscom:expression: CASE WHEN SettingOwner = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases)) + ", except specified>" Else Presentation(SettingOwnerType) + ": " + CASE WHEN ValueIsFilled(SettingOwner) Then Presentation(SettingOwnerDuplicate) Else "<All infobases>" End End

dataSet.query:
SELECT DISTINCT CustomizedUsersWithGroups.User AS User, ChangeProhibitionDates.User AS SettingOwner, ChangeProhibitionDates.Section, ChangeProhibitionDates.Object, ChangeProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate, PriorityCodes.Value AS Priority INTO ProhibitionDates FROM InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT 0 AS Code, 1 AS Value
UNION
SELECT 1, 2
UNION
SELECT 10, 3
UNION
SELECT 1000, 4
UNION
SELECT 1001, 5
UNION
SELECT 1010, 6
UNION
SELECT 1100, 7
UNION
SELECT 1101, 8
UNION
SELECT 1110, 9) AS PriorityCodes ON (CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.User = VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) THEN 0 ELSE 10 END + CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section THEN 0 ELSE 100 END + CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.Section = VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE 1000 END = PriorityCodes.Code) INNER JOIN (SELECT ChangeProhibitionDates.User AS User, ChangeProhibitionDates.User AS UsersGroup FROM InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates WHERE VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) <> Type(Catalog.Users) AND VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) <> Type(Catalog.UsersGroups) AND VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) <> Type(Catalog.ExternalUsers) AND VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) <> Type(Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups) AND ChangeProhibitionDates.User <> VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) AND (FALSE IN (&SpecifiedUsers) OR ChangeProhibitionDates.User IN (&SpecifiedUsers))
UNION
SELECT VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases), VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases) WHERE (FALSE IN (&SpecifiedUsers) OR TRUE IN (&SpecifiedUsers))) AS CustomizedUsersWithGroups ON (ChangeProhibitionDates.User IN (VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllDatabases), CustomizedUsersWithGroups.UsersGroup)) AND (ChangeProhibitionDates.Object <> UNDEFINED) AND ((NOT(ChangeProhibitionDates.Object <> ChangeProhibitionDates.Section AND ChangeProhibitionDates.Section = VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef)))) ;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// SELECT DISTINCT ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.User AS UserDuplicate, VALUETYPE(ProhibitionDates.User) AS UserType, ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner, ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner AS SettingOwnerDuplicate, VALUETYPE(ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner) AS SettingOwnerType, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object, PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.ProhibitionDate, ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate AS DateBanSettings, ProhibitionDates.Priority AS SettingPriority, ChangeProhibitionDates.Comment AS CommentSettings, PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Comment FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT PriorityDates.User AS User, PriorityDates.Section AS Section, PriorityDates.Object AS Object, PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate AS ProhibitionDate, MAX(ChangeProhibitionDates.Comment) AS Comment FROM (SELECT ProhibitionDates.User AS User, ProhibitionDates.Section AS Section, ProhibitionDates.Object AS Object, MAX(ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate) AS ProhibitionDate, MAX(ProhibitionDates.Priority) AS Priority FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT ProhibitionDates.User AS User, ProhibitionDates.Section AS Section, ProhibitionDates.Object AS Object, MAX(ProhibitionDates.Priority) AS Priority FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates
GROUP BY ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object) AS MaximumPriority ON ProhibitionDates.User = MaximumPriority.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = MaximumPriority.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = MaximumPriority.Object AND ProhibitionDates.Priority = MaximumPriority.Priority
GROUP BY ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object) AS PriorityDates INNER JOIN ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates ON (ProhibitionDates.User = PriorityDates.User) AND (ProhibitionDates.Section = PriorityDates.Section) AND (ProhibitionDates.Object = PriorityDates.Object) AND (ProhibitionDates.Priority = PriorityDates.Priority) AND (ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate = PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate) INNER JOIN InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates ON (ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner = ChangeProhibitionDates.User) AND (ProhibitionDates.Section = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section) AND (ProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Object) AND (ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate = ChangeProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate)
GROUP BY PriorityDates.User, PriorityDates.Section, PriorityDates.Object, PriorityDates.Priority, PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate) AS PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons ON ProhibitionDates.User = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Object INNER JOIN InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates ON ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner = ChangeProhibitionDates.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Object WHERE (NOT((NOT FALSE IN (&SpecifiedSections)) AND ProhibitionDates.Section <> VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) AND (NOT ProhibitionDates.Section IN (&SpecifiedSections)))) AND (NOT((NOT FALSE IN (&SpecifiedObjects)) AND ProhibitionDates.Object <> ProhibitionDates.Section AND (NOT ProhibitionDates.Object IN (&SpecifiedObjects))))

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN User = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) Then 1 Else 0 End
CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then 1 Else 0 End
CASE WHEN Object = Section Then 1 Else 0 End

Даты запрета загрузки данных по разделам для информационных баз
